name: Arcane Siphon
desc:
You reach out to all creatures and prepare to take in some of the magic they expend on their spells. Every time a creature within 60 feet casts a spell, you restore hit points and MP equal to the tier of the spell. You can spend 1 AP as a response to double the MP restored, dealing arcane damage to the target equal to twice the tier of the spell in the process.

In addition, you have resistance to damage from spells. When you are targeted by a spell, you restore hit points and MP equal to the tier of the spell.
author: CrusaderDroid
